text: The men's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 31 July and 1 August 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Christian Malcolm Jamie Henthorn John Stewart Mark Findlay ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jérôme Éyana Frédéric Krantz Cédric Gold Daig David Patros ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Alexander Kosenkow Stefan Holz Michael Schäfer Falk Schrader ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 1 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
